feat(auth): add OAuth2 authentication support
feat(cache): implement Redis caching layer  
feat(types): add TypeScript strict mode compliance
fix(memory): resolve memory leaks in long-running processes
fix(unicode): handle special characters in venue names
chore(deps): update all dependencies to latest versions
ci(testing): migrate from Jest to Vitest
ci(workflow): add automated security scanning
docs(readme): update installation instructions
docs(api): add comprehensive API documentation
refactor(api): redesign core API for better DX
perf(cache): optimize query performance by 40%
test(integration): add end-to-end API tests
style(lint): fix ESLint formatting issues
